SELECT t.landpage_id landpageId, t.campaign_id campaignId, IFNULL(SUM(t.click_amount),0) AS clickAmount, IFNULL(SUM(t.arrival_amount),0) AS arrivalAmount, IFNULL(SUM(t.arrival_amount)/SUM(t.click_amount),0) AS arrivalRate, IFNULL(SUM(t.unique_amount),0) AS uniqueAmount, IFNULL(round(avg(t.resident_time)),0) as residentTime, IFNULL(SUM(t.jump_amount),0) AS jumpAmount, ifnull(SUM(t.jump_amount)/SUM(t.arrival_amount),0) AS jumpRate FROM pap_t_landpagedata_hour t
WHERE t.campaign_id = #{campaignId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.datetime BETWEEN #{beginTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY t.landpage_id
